```{r setup}
library(scattermore2)
```

## Create histogram
```{r}
histogram <- make_histogram(cbind(rnorm(1e5), rnorm(1e5)), xlim=c(-5,5), ylim=c(-5,5))
image(histogram)
```

## Apply kernels on histogram
```{r}
blurred_histogram <- apply_kernel_histogram(histogram, kernel_pixels=10)
gauss_blurred_histogram <- apply_kernel_histogram(histogram, filter="gauss", kernel_pixels=10)
image(blurred_histogram)
image(gauss_blurred_histogram)
```

## Colorize blurred histogram
```{r}
colorized <- colorize_histogram(blurred_histogram)
raster <- rgba_int_to_raster(rgbwt_to_rgba_int(colorized))
plot(raster)
```
